text: Bradley Scott Schneider (born August 20, 1961) is an American politician. He is the U.S. Representative for Illinois's 10th congressional district since 2017. He held this office before from 2013 to 2015. He is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Politicians from Denver Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Brad Schneider
